# RDPipelineRasterizationState

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Pipeline rasterization state (used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_cull_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PolygonCullMode](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_PolygonCullMode) **cull_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_cull_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cull_mode**\ (\ value\: [PolygonCullMode](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_PolygonCullMode)\ )
- [PolygonCullMode](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_PolygonCullMode) **get_cull_mode**\ (\ )

The cull mode to use when drawing polygons, which determines whether front faces or backfaces are hidden.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_clamp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **depth_bias_clamp** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_clamp)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_bias_clamp**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_depth_bias_clamp**\ (\ )

A limit for how much each depth value can be offset. If negative, it serves as a minimum value, but if positive, it serves as a maximum value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_constant_factor"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **depth_bias_constant_factor** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_constant_factor)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_bias_constant_factor**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_depth_bias_constant_factor**\ (\ )

A constant offset added to each depth value. Applied after [depth_bias_slope_factor](class_rdpipelinerasterizationstate.md#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_slope_factor).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **depth_bias_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_bias_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_depth_bias_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, each generated depth value will by offset by some amount. The specific amount is generated per polygon based on the values of [depth_bias_slope_factor](class_rdpipelinerasterizationstate.md#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_slope_factor) and [depth_bias_constant_factor](class_rdpipelinerasterizationstate.md#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_constant_factor).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_slope_factor"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **depth_bias_slope_factor** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_slope_factor)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth_bias_slope_factor**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_depth_bias_slope_factor**\ (\ )

A constant scale applied to the slope of each polygons' depth. Applied before [depth_bias_constant_factor](class_rdpipelinerasterizationstate.md#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_depth_bias_constant_factor).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_discard_primitives"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **discard_primitives** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_discard_primitives)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_discard_primitives**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_discard_primitives**\ (\ )

If ``true``, primitives are discarded immediately before the rasterization stage.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_enable_depth_clamp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **enable_depth_clamp** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_enable_depth_clamp)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_depth_clamp**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_enable_depth_clamp**\ (\ )

If ``true``, clamps depth values according to the minimum and maximum depth of the associated viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_front_face"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PolygonFrontFace](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_PolygonFrontFace) **front_face** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_front_face)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_front_face**\ (\ value\: [PolygonFrontFace](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_PolygonFrontFace)\ )
- [PolygonFrontFace](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_PolygonFrontFace) **get_front_face**\ (\ )

The winding order to use to determine which face of a triangle is considered its front face.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_line_width"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **line_width** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_line_width)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_line_width**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_line_width**\ (\ )

The line width to use when drawing lines (in pixels). Thick lines may not be supported on all hardware.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_patch_control_points"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **patch_control_points** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_patch_control_points)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_patch_control_points**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_patch_control_points**\ (\ )

The number of control points to use when drawing a patch with tessellation enabled. Higher values result in higher quality at the cost of performance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_wireframe"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **wireframe** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineRasterizationState_property_wireframe)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_wireframe**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_wireframe**\ (\ )

If ``true``, performs wireframe rendering for triangles instead of flat or textured rendering.
